CatDescriptText: Coal miners leaving the tunnels at the end of their shift.  The miners are wearing heavy work pants, shirts, shoes, and hats with lights attached.  The carts used to carry coal are also exiting next to the miners.  The sign above the entrance reads 'Danger No Smoking, Matches, Or Open Lights.'  To the left of the entrance is a poster depicts a magician pulling a rabbit out of a top hat: "It takes business, workers, and management...together...to make...."
TitMainTitle: Coal miners exiting coal mine with poster of magician pulling rabbit from hat near coal cars in Library, Pennsylvania
